item.title: Compile-time primes
item.description: Anyone who has seen C++ template meta-programming must have come across the compile-time prime number generator by Erwin Unruh. Since then the language has evolved and provides a very readible alternative. In this post I'll touch on both the classical and modern approach.

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Every now and then I'll post some findings in programming and math, ranging from solutions to Project Euler exercises to numerical methods in partial differential equations.
